resources.string: Bạn phải nhập đầy đủ thông

The Coffee House is one of the few companies in the retail sector that has a good and really useful app, You can order fast food delivered directly from the app, besides having a coffee shop with friends. And when you place a drink from the app, with a customer-focused motto, Helio is constantly striving for dedicated and creative work to bring the best variety of products and services to the customer. line. The Coffee House is confident that it will stand firm and thrive in both domestic and foreign markets.
+ Order and payment at the table without the presence of staff.
+ Automatically selects exactly where you are sitting with the GPRS positioning feature.
+ Menu varies according to your daily consumption habits.
